name: Disney The Lion King
description:
This script will install "Disney The Lion King" GOG edition for DOSBox.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- GOG stopped to sell this game on 2018-10-01, but it stays available for download for gamers bought this game before this date.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

execute.command: cd $GAMEDIR; sed -i "s/\.././g" dosbox_lionking_single.conf; sed -i "s/.*mididevice=default.*/mididevice=none/g" dosbox_lionking.conf; sed -i "s/=surface/=openglnb/g" dosbox_lionking.conf; sed -i "s/fullresolution=original/fullresolution=desktop/g" dosbox_lionking.conf;

content:
custom-name: Disney The Lion King - GOG
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_lionking_single.conf
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_lionking.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: setup
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/data/noarch/
- execute:
    command: cd $GAMEDIR; sed -i "s/\.././g" dosbox_lionking_single.conf; sed -i "s/.*mididevice=default.*/mididevice=none/g"
      dosbox_lionking.conf; sed -i "s/=surface/=openglnb/g" dosbox_lionking.conf;
      sed -i "s/fullresolution=original/fullresolution=desktop/g" dosbox_lionking.conf;
